Simple Flickr.

A simple flickr plugin that pulls in your flickr feed as a widget and a shortcode.
08.1.2015 labs code, wordpress. 1 minute

A simple flickr plugin that pulls in your flickr feed as a widget and a shortcode. Requires flickr ID. Get it here!

Widget options: Title, id ( idgettr ), type ( user/group ), and display ( random/latest ).

Shortcode Params: [flickr before='' after='' wrapper='' class='']

Todo:

Add Simple_Flickr_Widget::display_cached_content(); function for shortcode to pull from.
